subject: Re: [PATCH v4 2/2] nfsdctl/rpc.nfsd: Add support for passing encrypted filehandle key

reviews.author: Benjamin Coddington (author)
reviews.summary: Reviewer Benjamin Coddington raised concerns about handling downgraded kernels, where the kernel doesn't support setting a key for signed filehandles. He clarified that in this case, the exportfs will reject the export config with 'sign_fh' option.

reviews.author: Jeff Layton
reviews.summary: Reviewer Jeff Layton raised concerns about error handling and kernel compatibility, suggesting that the 'threads' command should fail if it can't set a filehandle key and questioning whether autostart should succeed in case of a kernel downgrade.
